49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Abdullah bin Abi Bakrah, who was a governor in Sijistan, said:"Abu Bakrah wrote to me, saying: 'I heard the Messenger of Allah [SAW] say: No one should pass two judgments on one issue, and no one should pass judgment between two disputing parties while he is angry

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ أَنْ يُقْضَى فِي قَضَاءٍ بِقَضَاءَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Passing Two Judgments on One Issue
